document_data.name: ''Murial's Decapitator''
document_data.creator: [[Halaster Blackcloak]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Murial's decapitator''''' was a unique [[magic]] weapon crafted by [[Halaster Blackcloak]] for [[Muiral]] when he served as the Mad Mage's personal bodyguard.
document_data.Description: ''Murial's decapitator'' was a massive [[greatsword]] made from [[adamantine]] that weighed {{SI|16|lb|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.Powers: The weapon possessed the ''[[vorpal]]'' [[weapon quality]], making it much easier for the wielder to decapitate and dismember foes. A touch from ''Murial's decapitator'' also made [[magic item]]s glow for several minutes.
document_data.History: Following his transformation into a [[giant scorpion]], Murial had the weapon reforged by a renegade of [[Clan Melairkyn]] to better suit his new body. Murial retained possession of the greatsword as of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
